reviewText: This is a wonderful vintage American film with two great stars giving heartfelt performances--yet there is no US release?  I love this movie, but I have it on an old VHS tape.  I wish it was being remastered and saved on a DVD!
The DVD is just a copy taken off of television. About 2/3 through the movie there is about 90 seconds of silence. Aggravating.

I love this movie but the copy I received is very poor quality.  It was obviously something someone copied from a local television broadcast.  There were interruptions in the flow of the movie... I assume for commercials during the broadcast.  At one point the sound completely disappeared for a a whole scene.  I was very disappointed in the copy I received.  I would still love to see a copy of the movie that is professionally done.
The DVD didn't come in a case but just a cover, that was my first clue that I was gett5ing a copy of a copy.  The DVD is scratchy. It is one of my favorite films so I am disappointed.
